verbs.description: at boston synagogue [ARGM-TMP: a night] to [V: remember] [ARG1: pittsburgh] and to heal they came by the hundreds sang songs laughed prayed and witnessed the ceremonial naming of a baby one of their newest congregation members it was a shabbat at temple israel of boston a recognition of the jewish sabbath but it was also the first friday service since 11 jews were gunned down at a pittsburgh synagogue in what authorities have called a hate crime on friday night temple israel congregants were joined by civic and religious writer boston synagogue temple israel mayor martin j walsh trinity church temple israel of the city of new york copley square founding fathers senator edward j markey craig f boston workmens circle center for jewish culture martin luther king jr jack curtis liz walker new england holocaust memorial pittsburgh synagogue charlie baker baseball boston workmen circle center for jewish culture islamic society of boston cultural center boston first presbyterian church yusufi vali massachusetts department of correction south boston elementary school pittsburgh pittsburgh tree of life synagogue assault executive director temple israel of boston governor charlie baker united states president george washington audrey roxbury r i new england jamaica plain old south church newport jennifer aronson rabbi elaine zecher ed markey roxbury presbyterian church mayor martin j walsh
